title: Ukrainians Return Home by the Millions
itunes:title: Ukrainians Return Home by the Millions
description:
Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Senior Reporter for International Affairs Marc Champion provide the details of Marc's Businessweek story Ukrainians Return Home by the Millions Even as War Rages On. Bloomberg News Chief China Markets Correspondent Sofia Horta E Costa discusses the latest business and economic news out of China. Bloomberg News Senior Editor Chris Anstey breaks down why Fed rate hikes are not packing an economic punch. Bloomberg Intelligence Technology and Media Analyst Geetha Ranganathan explains how ads could breathe new life into the Netflix narrative.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Paul Sweeney. Producer: Paul Brennan.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
